tweet:
shipped auto-polly: the platform now tries to fix its own bugs before bothering us. 

also cleaned up the sdk packages and wrote actual docs for api errors. guessing stack traces is only fun for the first hour.

6 prs merged today.
alt_tweet: big housekeeping day. sdk packages renamed, onboarding docs streamlined, and the platform now auto-patches certain bugs. less entropy, more stability.
image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot and the robot mechanic fixing a glowing lime green (#ecf874) server rack together. The bee holds a tiny pixel wrench, the robot holds a manual. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SELF REPAIR'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
reasoning: Highlights the most novel feature (self-repair) while acknowledging the necessary grunt work (docs/cleanup) with dry humor about debugging pain.
